this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - green - yarn needle - scissors final size leaf height of 5 cm and width of 3 cm technical notes *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern vine green make 10 chains per leaf plus an additional 10 chains at the end i would recommend attaching the leaves at the 10 chain mark *fasten_off leaf green step 1 chain 7 start in the second chain from the hook step 2 make 1 slip_stitch 1 single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet and 1 double_crochet you should have 1 chain left to work in 5 sts step 3 work all 6 stitches into the last chain in the last chain make 2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet and 2 double_crochet 6 sts step 4 start working on the opposite side of the leaf you should have 5 chain s left to work in make 1 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet and 1 slip_stitch 5 sts *fasten_off and leave about 15 cm of yarn to sew the leaf to the vine fasten_off and pull through the weave up and sew the leaf to the leave a 15 cm yarn top to make the down to get the vine tail leaf sharper yarn to the bottom of the leaf link to video - https //youtu be/xazrp6uk7hw if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
